DRiFT.js is a browser-based racing game featuring synchronized multiplayer gameplay and track editing. Players can customize their cars, compete in real-time races, and collaboratively build tracks using different terrain types. The game includes mobile controls, leaderboards, chat functionality, and physics adjustments controlled by room hosts.
